text: 25.11 Apo 23.11, 23.29, 25.25, 26.31-32, 28.19 Pen tap olap gen, kot gɨl yɨp paklun apɨlap ak, ma pɨlɨkɨpɨnep agak. Ak yɨp monmon pakɨpɨlap agak. Pen kot gɨl, takaw jɨj ma mɨdeb ak, yɨp Juda binɨb kɨlop ñɨnɨgeban ak, yɨpɨd ma gup agak. Anɨb ak yad Lom gapman bɨnonɨm ne mɨdeb ak amɨl, takaw anɨb awl agɨnɨgayn agak. Yad pen Jelusalem ma amnɨgayn agak.
